titles: The humorous courtier A comedy, as it hath been presented with good applause at the private house in Drury-Lane. Written by Iames Shirley Gent.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[otes] for William Cooke, and are to be sold by Iames Becket, in the Inner Temple,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
